title: Takyeon
author: Takyeon
content: There was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?

comments.author: crypto-project
comments.body: as far as I know today there are still several faucet platforms that pay their users, but don't expect much from these platforms because the rewards they provide are much less compared to a few years ago.

comments.author: Devifajarina
comments.body: Quote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  That's how they developed the coin, Dogecoin didn't look so good at the beginning, so they forced them to make a strategy to make claims on certain sites, the result is now Dogecoin is much stronger than when it first appeared, but unlike shiba inu, I haven't seen any sites that we can use it for faucets, shiba inu with different dogecoins, but both are able to survive in the market with their respective prices, so the opportunity for shiba inu is very dependent on future developments

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: You will find it by searching on google with "Shiba Inu Faucet" keyword, For the Android version itself, you can use the Shiba Inu Faucet. In addition, you can also use Coinfaucet for web-based faucets. I've personally never used these faucets, so I don't know if the website and mobile app I attached above pays for it or not.

comments.author: Takyeon
comments.body: Quote from: Devifajarina on May 28, 2022, 07:53:42 AMQuote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  That's how they developed the coin, Dogecoin didn't look so good at the beginning, so they forced them to make a strategy to make claims on certain sites, the result is now Dogecoin is much stronger than when it first appeared, but unlike shiba inu, I haven't seen any sites that we can use it for faucets, shiba inu with different dogecoins, but both are able to survive in the market with their respective prices, so the opportunity for shiba inu is very dependent on future developmentsI believe that Shiba will forever be a big name in crypto industry if they successfully launch the shibarium blockchain which is a layer 2 tech, this will solve many issues like the CEO said, looking forward to the release by June ending, with this strategy it will be bigger than doge coin.

comments.author: Kocret02
comments.body: Quote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  Currently Dogecoin has developed, in contrast to that time in 2017, almost all the sites that I have visited, at this time no longer available Dogecoin that we can take for free, but in contrast to Shiba Inu, the concept of coin development is not the same as Dogecoin on At the beginning of the appearance, I can say that Shiba Inu has the same opportunity as Dogecoin, but the market is currently not supporting them

comments.author: Devifajarina
comments.body: Quote from: Takyeon on May 29, 2022, 07:16:35 AMQuote from: Devifajarina on May 28, 2022, 07:53:42 AMQuote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  That's how they developed the coin, Dogecoin didn't look so good at the beginning, so they forced them to make a strategy to make claims on certain sites, the result is now Dogecoin is much stronger than when it first appeared, but unlike shiba inu, I haven't seen any sites that we can use it for faucets, shiba inu with different dogecoins, but both are able to survive in the market with their respective prices, so the opportunity for shiba inu is very dependent on future developmentsI believe that Shiba will forever be a big name in crypto industry if they successfully launch the shibarium blockchain which is a layer 2 tech, this will solve many issues like the CEO said, looking forward to the release by June ending, with this strategy it will be bigger than doge coin.All developments must see opportunities based on need, it's not wrong what you say, that shiba inu will be quite developed when they start launching the shibarium blockchain, but isn't this what other coins have done, but also hasn't met the expectations of many people, shiba inu is still in in the category of undeveloped meme coins, even though they were able to stay in the market for quite a while, something happened not only because they have an edge, but how community, volume and utility are three things that influence simultaneously

comments.author: aryana42
comments.body: Quote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  for now I have not found a faucet for shiba inu coins, the case between dogecoin and shiba inu is different, in the past dogecoin was not very valuable in the market, so many service sites that provide free dogecoin, but now when the price of dogecoin has improved and is expensive, the site has never been found Again, this is a promotional model carried out by Dogecoin, but Shiba Inu is not necessarily capable of doing that

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Takyeon on May 29, 2022, 07:16:35 AMI believe that Shiba will forever be a big name in crypto industry if they successfully launch the shibarium blockchain which is a layer 2 tech, this will solve many issues like the CEO said, looking forward to the release by June ending, with this strategy it will be bigger than doge coin.Utility is what makes a coin a long term project in the crypto network, does Shiba have actual utility to be a long term project, or is it just a pump and dump coin backed by quite a lot of promises that prolly would not come into fruition, i am not attempting to discourage you in your believe, but these are essential questions investors must ask themselves. In my opinion i believe Shiba is just a short term project that would only last as long as its hype does.Quote from: Takyeon on May 28, 2022, 06:50:25 AMThere was a time in 2017 where you can claim free doge coin every minutes or hour through the faucet website but now they are not working again, I guess that's because things have changed a lot, doge coin is no more a cheap coin but I think Shiba Inu is now in where Doge coin was years ago so is there any faucet for Shiba Inu?  You are basically looking for free coins, i am afraid it is going to be difficult to get, and mind you that even if you do it is going to be little or nothing, if you really want Shiba, you better buy some with your cash.
